name: Druid
description: The main hero of the game is a druid who is looking for a teacher to gain wisdom, but his way lays through the magic forest that contains a lot of obstacles and riddles.<br/>You will have to collect magic runes that give you different abilities, solve puzzles and help forest dwellers to find your teacher.<h3>Features</h3><ul><li> Magic forest atmosphere;<br/></li><li> Stylized graphics;<br/></li><li> Big set of different abilities;<br/></li><li> Large number of interesting puzzles.</li></ul>
